title: Mock Draft Monday: Are the Panthers picking Kenny Pickett? Evan Neal #1 to the Jaguars, Drake London first WR off the board, Kayvon Thibodeaux falls to #7 (Football 2/28)
description:
Ryan Wilson is on his way to Indianapolis for the NFL Scouting Combine, but that's okay because Chris Trapasso gets to share his latest mock for Mock Draft Monday 2.0. Traps explains to Will Brinson his reasoning for mocking Evan Neal #1 to the Jaguars (3:30) as well as some value bets to go with the top pick. Kyle Hamilton might be the best overall prospect in the draft but not many experts have him going as high as Trapasso (14:00)...Also, could the Panthers be the team to select the first wide receiver or do all signs point towards Kenny Pickett (17:00)? The guys discuss Malik Willis to the Commanders (28:00), a slip for Kayvon Thibodeaux (32:30) and the quarterback class (36:00). 

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
You can listen to Pick Six on your smart speakers! Simply say "Alexa, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast" or "Hey Google, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast."
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @johnbreech, @E_DeBerardinis
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/picksix
